Instruction: Warm a skillet with a heavy base over medium heat.
Combine the self-rising flour and buttermilk in a bowl until a dough forms; transfer it onto a lightly floured work surface.
Shape the dough into a 1 1/2-inch thick circle.
Add some flour to cover the base of the skillet lightly.
Brown the dough evenly in the skillet for about 8 minutes on each side.
